name: Jumplock
description:
The game is mainly based on ELITE from the C64 era. Besides that, M.U.L.E. plays a crucial role. The 2D space battles take place in or near asteroid fields and respect physics. You are not a trader but a shipper. At auctions you get shipments by making the cheapest offer for transport.

This is a demo version. You can always start a new game, but you will only have a limited number of hyperspace jumps per game.

Instructions

You will find a help button in several places in the game, which will give you access to the comprehensive tutorial.

Controls

For this web version you need keyboard and mouse. A gamepad will not work.
